verbs.description: Trump and Jong - un [V: had] just finished off a working lunch when the American president appeared to make an unscheduled stop at the huge armored car , known as The Beast .

[ARG0: Trump and Jong - un] had [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: finished] off [ARG1: a working lunch] [ARGM-TMP: when the American president appeared to make an unscheduled stop at the huge armored car , known as The Beast] .
Trump and Jong - un had just finished off a [V: working] [ARG0: lunch] when the American president appeared to make an unscheduled stop at the huge armored car , known as The Beast .

Trump and Jong - un had just finished off a working lunch [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: the American president] [V: appeared] [C-ARG1: to make an unscheduled stop at the huge armored car , known as The Beast] .

Trump and Jong - un had just finished off a working lunch when [ARG0: the American president] appeared to [V: make] [ARG1: an unscheduled stop] [ARGM-LOC: at the huge armored car , known as The Beast] .
Trump and Jong - un had just finished off a working lunch when the American president appeared to make an unscheduled stop at [ARG1: the huge armored car] , [V: known] [ARG2: as The Beast] .
